metadata.title: Va Riverside Retreat Hue - Riverside Homestay
metadata.description: Va Riverside Retreat - Premium homestay in Hue with Kim Phung mountain and Perfume River views. Outdoor pool, SUP activities, near Khai Dinh Tomb. Rated 9.8/10. From 250,000 VND.

about.title: About Va Riverside Retreat
about.description: Nestled by the poetic Perfume River with views of Kim Phung mountain, Va Riverside Retreat is the ideal space to relax and explore Hue's culture. With 9 diverse rooms, an outdoor pool, and SUP activities on the river, we deliver memorable vacation experiences for all travelers.

testimonials.description: Guest satisfaction is our motivation to continuously improve our services

review1.name: Minh Anh
review1.comment: The Perfume River and Kim Phung mountain views are amazing! Beautiful pool, peaceful atmosphere. Close to Khai Dinh Tomb, very convenient for sightseeing. Friendly and helpful hosts.

review2.name: Tuan Kiet
review2.comment: SUP experience on the Perfume River was fantastic! Clean rooms with full amenities. Location near the royal tombs is convenient for exploring Hue. Reasonable prices.

review3.name: Thu Ha
review3.comment: Wonderful homestay for those wanting to escape city noise. Beautiful views, fresh air. Nice design and comfortable. Highly recommended!
